oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - #067
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Eddy Arnold Show #67, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold and the Tennessee Plowboys, the Willis Brothers, Roy Wiggins, and host 'Pappy' Hal Horton. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'; closing theme music, 'Boil Them Cabbage Down'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Tennessee Plowboys; Willis Brothers; Roy Wiggins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Hal Horton) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddy Arnold) -- I'll Step Aside (Eddy Arnold) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Someday (You'll Want Me To Want You) (Eddy Arnold) -- Eddy Arnold introduces the Willis Brothers -- I'm Getting Tired Of Waiting (Willis Brothers) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- [Unidentified instrumental] (Roy Wiggins steel guitar) -- Hal Horton talks -- What's Gonna Happen To Me (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing statement (Eddy Arnold, Hal Horton) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show (Radio program); Horton, Hal, -1948; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Tennessee Plowboys; Wiggins, Roy; Willis Brothers; Willis, Skeeter, -1976; Willis, Vic, -1995
